1550560.name: Delivery Boy
1550560.description:
Add the game Delivery Boy to the wishlist and you will be the first to know about its release on Steam!



Play as a budding courier who has moved to Crystal City in search of work. Before you is a city of great opportunities, help the main character climb the career ladder and become the best courier.



■ Take various orders, deliver them to the right place and get money and experience points.
■ Open and manage delivery services.
■ Upgrade your own home and make it the prettiest in town!
■ Use special devices such as a resource detector, a garbage collector, and even a gravity gun to lift especially heavy loads.
■ Collect collectibles hidden throughout the city and explore interesting places.



The game is being developed by indie developer Sergey Poroshin. Thanks for your support!
1550560.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
